Html:
I downloaded the code and attempted to build and had 200+ errors. It appears that the issue is SubSonic since the Imports statement errored out. I attempted to add a reference to the DLL but it did not work.

Any ideas why this is happening or anyone else that has this problem? I also want to customize the Membership Information (the address) and assume that SubSonic will be needed to modify the DAL stuff.

Any help would be appreciated.

Thanks
Tom

GeoMarketing wrote:
I downloaded the code and attempted to build and had 200+ errors. It appears that the issue is SubSonic since the Imports statement errored out. I attempted to add a reference to the DLL but it did not work.

Any ideas why this is happening or anyone else that has this problem? I also want to customize the Membership Information (the address) and assume that SubSonic will be needed to modify the DAL stuff.

Try re-referencing it by deleting the first reference of SubSonic and then adding the new reference.

I think I found the problem.

I tried downloading the SubSonic source and it would not compile either, complaining about mySQL. So I downloaded mySQL and installed it and everything compiles fine!

Looks like a dependency on a dependency.

Tom
